headline: Why Palantir Stock (PLTR) May Be Worth Considering for 2025
summary: The software AI darling Palantir (PLTR) has seen its stock price rise by around 360% over the last twelve months, making it one of the most hyped stocks of the moment. Despite this dramatic increase, I believe there are still strong reasons for continued bullishness. These include Palantir’s position as the purest AI player in the software industry, impressive revenue and margin growth, and a solid trend of upward guidance revisions. As a result, I rate the stock as a Buy heading into 2025. In t

headline: Should You Forget Palantir and Buy These 2 Tech Stocks Instead?
summary: Palantir Technologies (NASDAQ: PLTR) was the best-performing stock in the S&P 500 last year.  It continues to have a big opportunity as it starts transitioning customers from proof of concept into production.  Let's look at two other stocks benefiting from AI trading at much cheaper valuations that investors can consider.
